SEARCH
Package model.resource

Class ResourceChest

java.lang.Object
model.resource.ResourceChest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
VentureCostResourceChest
public class ResourceChest extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a generic resource set, it has a map with key: Resource Type to get direct access to a resource
See Also:
